title: The Age of the App is Over
description: 'When you wake up each morning, do you think: what apps do I want to
  use? Or do you wonder instead: what goals do I want to achieve? For the last decade,
  our smartphones - the most important computers in our lives - have forced us to
  think about life in a pretty specific way.'
